summary: This script demonstrates how to train and evaluate a graph neural network for node property prediction on an OGB dataset, applying the Correct and Smooth post‑processing technique to refine the model's predictions. It sets up the dataset, builds a baseline MLP model, runs training, and computes evaluation metrics using the OGB evaluator.
business_intent: Provide a practical example for developers and researchers to apply the Correct and Smooth method to improve node classification performance in graph neural networks, showcasing integration with DGL, PyTorch, and OGB benchmarks.
